questions.question2: How accurate is the carbon footprint calculation?
questions.question3: Can I use EcoScan for commercial purposes?
questions.question4: How often is the database updated?

answers.answer1: No, we are not storing the images. We simply upload the image to Gemini for analysis and then discard it.
answers.answer2: Our carbon footprint calculation is based on the latest research and data. While it provides a good estimate, please note that it may not be 100% accurate for all scenarios.
answers.answer3: EcoScan is primarily designed for personal use. For commercial applications, please contact our support team to discuss licensing options.
answers.answer4: We update our database regularly to ensure the most accurate and up-to-date information. Major updates occur quarterly, with minor updates happening more frequently.
answers.answer5: Yes, we take data security very seriously. We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your information. We do not store or share any personal data without your explicit consent.
